data.name: CTIFMessage
data.value:
Could not connect to the Instrument.
Please exit out of this application, restart the Instrument, launch the application and retry.

data.name: DCFMessage
data.value:
Instrument diagnostics failed to run successfully. Click continue, power down the instrument for at least 30 seconds, restart the instrument, and wait 30 seconds until the instrument is ready. Retry the application. If the error continues to repeat call support.
Error: 10305 Result:

data.name: GSNFMessage
data.value: Could not retrieve Instrument's Serial Number. This feature may not be supported for this instrument.

data.name: WUCFMessage
data.value:
Warm-up check failed to run successfully. Click continue and wait until the instrument is warmed up sufficiently. Retry the application. If the error continues to repeat or if the instrument has been powered on more than 30 minutes, call support.
Error: 10304 Result:

data.name: SFMessage
data.value: Sample Scan failed to run successfully.

data.name: SPMessage
data.value: Place a Sample in Cup or Vial ...

data.name: SPUIMessage
data.value:
Please place a sample on the sample surface.
When done, click continue.

data.name: SSFMessage
data.value: Save Spectral File failed to run successfully.

data.name: USFMessage
data.value: Unload Spectral File failed to run successfully.

data.name: CXPFMessage
data.value: An error occurred while retrieving spectral data. Try again.

data.name: CXPMessage
data.value: Communicating with the QTA central processor

data.name: SXPFMessage
data.value: An error occurred during the analysis.

data.name: CCFMessage
data.value: Sample surface is dirty. Clean the surface and try again.

data.name: ALPHASPUIMessage
data.value:
Place a sample on the sample surface.
When done, click continue.

data.name: MIRSPUIMessage
data.value:
Please place a sample on the sample surface.
When done, click continue.

data.name: SGSPUIMessage
data.value: Place the sample in the funnel, click continue and pull the T-handle when ready to begin scanning

data.name: VECTORSPUIMessage
data.value: Place the sample in the test tube holder. Click continue to start the analysis

data.name: MPASPUIMessage
data.value:
For sample presentation in a vial, place the sample on the surface lens or vial holder; for presentation in a 6 mm tube, place the sample in the tube holder. (for accurate results, always leave a clean empty 6 mm tube in the tube holder when it is not in use).
Click continue to start the analysis

data.name: Error_10503
data.value: Unable to locate the XML file: {0}. Application restarting.

data.name: Product_Update_Message
data.value: There is an updated version of the InstrumentUI_ATK is available. Please click OK to install it.

data.name: SFD_Message
data.value: Unable to delete the Spectral File. Please log out and try again.

data.name: Error_10006
data.value: The system has experienced an unexpected error connecting to the database. Try to repair the database from the Admin tab Support menu.

data.name: InstanceRunningMessage
data.value: There is another instance of InstrumentUI_ATK running. Do you want to close the existing process and start an new process?

data.name: BPMessage
data.value: Place a vial with sample into the sample holder. Click continue when ready to proceed.

data.name: BPUIMessage
data.value: A background scan is required. Place an empty vial in the sample holder, then click continue.

data.name: SPMPAVMessage
data.value: Ready for sample scan. Place vial with sample into the sample holder, then click continue.

data.name: SPMPAVUIMessage
data.value: Ready for sample scan. Place vial with sample into the sample holder, then click continue.

data.name: AveragePrompt
data.value: Verify the sample surface is clean and dry, then place a sample on the surface.

data.name: CleanCheckBackgroundRequired
data.value: The program needs to take a background spectrum. Please verify the surface is cleaned well and dry. Then click 'Continue'.

data.name: Start_OPUS_Message
data.value: The OPUS program is not running. Please start OPUS prior to running QTA.

data.name: AFMessage
data.value: An error occurred while averaging samples. Try again.

data.name: AverageCleanCheckPrompt
data.value: Place a sample on the surface.

data.name: Error_11201
data.value:
The scheduled scans are more than the maximum allowed.
Decrease the scans per hour for one or more sample points.

data.name: Error_11202
data.value: Complete all required fields before activating.

data.name: RemoveButton
data.comment: Text on Remove button on the Manage Queue form

data.name: StatusScanRemovedFromQueue
data.comment: Status Message when Scheduled Scan Removed from Queue on the Manage Queue form
